review: Doctors explanation and treatment and advice. As I had Neck and shoulder pains I felt this doctor treated nicely and advised simple ways to handle the issues. I recommend him to any others who has similar issues. Thanks

He is an amazing doctor and a great individual.
He understood the root cause of the problem and eradicated it effectively.
Visited for the first time and the doctor was a good listener and explained the problem in a polite manner. I was prescribed medicines and the doctor was good and nice.

** ** * **** ******* *** not easily approachable or you can only contact him by booking online appointment. ********* *** *** *** ** **** ** ***  ** **** *** ***** ** **** *** ********* No matter how great emergency. After paying 2 times for the same ailment I am being forced to go to a New Doctor.
